basics.name: Rocky Huang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Storage and organization of new datasets onto the company's local server environment
Backup of datasets from the local server environment to the cloud environment
Running scripting to create video clips
Organizing video clips and editing video annotations using CVAT annotation tool
Creating and editing annotations in our annotation tool
Quality assurance (peer-review) of annotations
Established unified visual identity on internal-facing web pages using HTML and CSS, aligning with the company's brand theme
Implemented responsive design principles, ensuring a consistent viewing experience across various devices and browsers
Actively engaged in the team's bi-weekly sprints
Consistently delivered on commitments, evidenced by a 100% completion rate of assigned Jira tickets, showcasing effective task management and adherence to project timelines
Collaborated in daily stand-up meetings, offering comprehensive progress reports in line with the Agile framework that streamlines communication
Contributed to sprint retrospectives, giving insights and suggestions for process improvement

work.summary: Conduct undergraduate research on code quality and best coding practices
highlights: Examining the naming practices of identifiers in data science code, including implementing tools to extract abbreviations and acronyms and automatically looking for their expanded form
Performing a literature review to understand coding best practices for Python code and creating a catalog of such practices
Analysis of JUnit assertion error messages within open-source Java systems to explore their construction and characteristics
Employing grounded theory techniques and surveying professional developers on their experience and perception of assertion error messages

volunteer.summary: Peer mentor for incoming UHM freshmen
highlights: Successfully mentored and provided guidance to fellow students, fostering a supportive environment conducive to personal and academic growth
Demonstrated strong leadership by organizing and leading workshops, creating a positive and inclusive mentorship community that contributed to the overall success of the program

volunteer.summary: Led HUI senate meetings to plan events and activities for the cohort
highlights: Created and distributed monthly newsletters for the HUI cohort of 60+ undergraduate UHM students

Recorded and organized  meeting minutes during biweekly senate meetings, ensuring accurate documentation of discussions and action items, contributing to transparent communication and accountability within the team

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
